channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Lot Like Christmas
channel.desc: The owner of the most popular Christmas tree lot in Hudson Springs finds her business in jeopardy when a big-city marketing executive arrives with a chain store. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Novel Noel
channel.desc: A book editor takes on a temporary gig running a bookstore, where her battles with the owner's son allow her to rediscover her passion for nurturing creativity.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas CEO
channel.desc: The CEO of a small toy company gets a once in a lifetime offer to merge with a huge toy company, but needs her estranged ex-business partner's signature to seal the deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wise Men And A Baby
channel.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together to care for a baby over the Christmas holidays.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Cowboy Christmas Romance
channel.desc: Real estate closer Lexie returns to her hometown in Arizona one week before Christmas to try and convince a horse-whispering rancher to part ways with his family's land.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Winter Palace
channel.desc: A novelist with writer's block becomes the caretaker at an empty winter chateau to finish her book. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
channel.desc: Heilda encounters a charming local artisan while selling her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Joy For Christmas
channel.desc: A publicist introduces a famous athlete to the joys of Christmas in the hopes that he will assist her in saving her family's annual charity. Comedy romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Believe In Christmas
channel.desc: When Beatrice reluctantly joins her best friend on a trip to the enchanting Christmasland, she remains sceptical. But festive traditions and a friendly stranger warms her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Merry Ex-Mas
channel.desc: In an awkward turn of events, a man gets snowed in at Christmas with his ex-wife, her wealthy suitor, his former mother in law and his daughter.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: 12 Dares Of Christmas
channel.desc: Teacher Elara's quiet holiday season gets a jolt of spice when she accepts a 12 Dares of Christmas challenge from her sister.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hanukkah On Rye
channel.desc: Sparks fly when a matchmaker pairs Molly and Jacob, until they discover that they are rival deli owners. Will a Hanukkah miracle keep their love afloat.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Quest
channel.desc: When an archaeologist begins a search for an ancient Christmas treasure, she must team up with her ex-husband - who is an expert in Nordic languages - to find it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: #Xmas
channel.desc: Jen has some tough decisions to make when she gets to the final of a competition with a fake perfect 'family', made up of her, her nephew and her best friend Max.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sealed With A List
channel.desc: This holiday season, Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Merry Scottish Christmas
channel.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother, a big family secret is revealed.
